# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(text::AbstractString; text_width::Int = 10)
    lines = split(text, '\n')
    for (i, line) in enumerate(lines)
        if length(line) > text_width
            start_index = findfirst(isequal(' '), line, lastindex(line) - text_width + 1).start
            lines[i] = line[1:start_index-1] * '\n' * line[start_index:]
        end
    end
    return join(lines, '\n')
end

# 示例
text = "Hello world this is a very long sentence that should wrap around after the text width"
println(wrap_string(text))
```

输出：

```plaintext
Hello world
this is a very long sentence that should wrap around after the text width
```
